name: mverb
long_description: MVerb is a plugin that is based on a modified five-by-five 2D waveguide  mesh  developed  in  Csound  within  the  Cabbage  framework. MVerb is highly flexible and can generate compelling and unique rever-beration  effects  ranging  from  traditional  spaces  to  infinite  morphing spaces or the simulation of metallic plates or cymbals. The plugin incor-porates a 10-band parametric EQ for timbrel control and delay random-ization to create more unusual effects
author: Eduardo Moguillansky
